Text: This is the BEST version for this movie. Although more recent torrents have the "extended version", there is a reason why they left all of that extra stuff on the cutting room floor - because it is just expository crap! This is the original theatrical version: 137 minutes (2:17 vs. the director's cut of 2:34).
